NEW Rule For Tournament Entrants: EVERYONE READ!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): The Locker Room (Q&A): NEW Rule For Tournament Entrants: EVERYONE READ!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, April 20, 2003 - 03:12 pm:

We have been allowing people to use other people's saves to enter tournaments, which in theory is fine, except (as happened today) when two people enter the same tourney with the same save, that is to say the exact same unedited file name. So, here is the new ruling:

If you you use someone else's save to enter an event, you MUST rename the file. Putting your board name in the file name is also helpful in sorting things out.
If you do not know how to rename the file, then either learn how, or don't enter.

By Chris on Sunday, April 20, 2003 - 03:35 pm:

sorry Lisa...I thought I had changed the name
and put my board name in there....
it looks like I changed it in the save that is still on my computer...but I'm new at this and maybe I didn't...again I apologize for the confusion....

By Omni Strunks on Sunday, April 20, 2003 - 04:10 pm:

You mean to change the name of the rancher name or the name of the save file itself?

Like if two people would use the asil save in mr2?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, April 20, 2003 - 04:13 pm:

I mean the name of the save file on your PC. (You cannot change the rancher name in MR3.) It's so I don't get two files called MRSave44889-235474.sps and the computer thinks they are the same.

By mepersoner on Monday, April 21, 2003 - 03:15 am:

To think after all the times me and Hamsterman used my save file for breeding.... we never messed it up like that once. 8)

By Chris on Monday, April 21, 2003 - 09:50 am:
